summary: This is an email chain between FBI personnel discussing coordination of victim assistance for Jeffrey Epstein victims and an investigation into Clare Iveagh. It involves the FBI's Victim Services Division and references the National Crime Agency (NCA).

persons.name: Clare Iveagh
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of an investigation by the National Crime Agency (NCA), with the SDNY having no issue with the NCA proceeding.

events.title: Coordination for Epstein victim assistance
events.description: FBI personnel discuss coordinating a meeting with victims associated with Jeffrey Epstein and establishing contact with assigned Victim Specialists.

keyFacts: The SDNY has no issue with the UK's National Crime Agency (NCA) proceeding with their investigation of Clare Iveagh.
FBI Victim Services Division personnel are coordinating to arrange a meeting with victims associated with Jeffrey Epstein, from the first investigation until his death.
The email seeks to identify and coordinate with Victim Specialists (VS) who have established good rapport with the victims.
